name: Skrungular
description:
Skrungular is an arcade game inspired by Pong. Use the arrow keys to put up walls and prevent the ball from flying off screen! Careful, you can only have one wall up at a time. Press Esc to quit the game.

Made in Unity for Global Game 2020.

Credits:

Jonah Venglarcik: Programming

Jade Marmorstein: Programming

Music and Sound Effects by SubspaceAudio on OpenGameArt.org.
